channel.title: CVE Feed for Talos -- Foscam
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Talos -- Foscam

item.title: CVE-2017-2871|2024-09-16T20:47:04.590Z -- talos -- foscam
item.description: Insufficient security checks exist in the recovery procedure used by the Foscam C1 Indoor HD Camera running application firmware 2.52.2.43. An attacker who is in the same subnetwork of the camera or has remote administrator access can fully compromise the device by performing a firmware recovery using a custom image.
